Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Harlem/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Harlem/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near Harlem
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Harlem due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Harlem due to track switching problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
